body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_systolic,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_diastolic,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at1006]/value as T0_mean_arterial_pressure,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at1007]/value as T0_pulse_pressure,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at1059]/value as T0_clinical_interpretation,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0033]/value as T0_comment,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/state[at0007]/items[at0008]/value as T0_position,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/state[at0007]/items[at1052]/value as T0_confounding_factors,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/state[at0007]/items[at1043]/value as T0_sleep_status,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/state[at0007]/items[at1005]/value as T0_tilt
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.blood_pressure.v2]
  )
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
